if.test: object is a patent, physical object, or ephemera
object is NOT patent, physical object, or ephemera

symplectic_field.name: are-files-confidential
symplectic_field.note: We assuming this means ANY binary file is embargoed

symplectic_field.name: author-licence
symplectic_field.note: See GitHub #149

symplectic_field.name: associated-authors
symplectic_field.ora_note: In ORA, associated contributors would have a role attribute, with role_title="contributor" and role_order denoting their position in the 'contributor' role order. Translators would have the role 'translator'

symplectic_field.name: authors
symplectic_field.ora_note: In ORA authors would have a role attribute, with contributors__contributor_roles__role_title="author" and contributors__contributor_roles__role_order denoting their position in the author order

symplectic_field.name: author-url
symplectic_field.note: Was contributors__contributor_website_url but author-url is not author's personal website

symplectic_field.name: c-apc2
symplectic_field.note: Deprecated field

symplectic_field.name: c-apc
symplectic_field.note: New field mapping for 2.1

if.note: If the item is a Report, the type of work should be Report and the sub_type_of_work should be 'Confidential report', see TYPE OF WORK MAPPIGNS, below

symplectic_field.name: editors
symplectic_field.ora_note: In ORA, editors would have a role attribute, with role_title="editor" and role_order denoting their position in the editor order. If the record was a Thesis, they would have the role_title of 'Supervisor'

symplectic_field.name: embargo-release-date
symplectic_field.note: A file which is embargoed but with no specified end date will have the end date 9999-12-31

if.ora_note: Identifiers with a mapping specified in the ORA Data Model should be mapped using those fields. The value of @scheme should be mapped to record_identifiers__record_identifier_scheme

symplectic_field.name: is-compliant-with-inst-policy
symplectic_field.notes: ignore, this acts as OAM compliance override

symplectic_field.name: is-open-access
symplectic_field.note: Set to True where Hyrax record (for OA Monitor logic). AB note: TODO: we may map this to licence_url

symplectic_field.name: is-embargoed
symplectic_field.note: A file with ANY binary_files__file_embargo_end_date is embargoed.

if.test: record is a Conference, Exhibition, Performance, or Presentation
record is Conference item/any or Composition/performance

symplectic_field.name: notes
symplectic_field.note: As other fields write to additional information, this should be appended to the additional_information value and not replace it

if.note: The text "ARTN" should be removed from the front of an article number, leading zeros should also be removed

symplectic_field.name: online-publication-date
symplectic_field.note: Crosswalk for deposit only. If null then map publication-date instead

if.notes: Append " pages" to value, e.g. "32 pages"
Output as a range, separated by a '-', e.g '22-33'

if.test: pagination is given both as a range and a page count
if.notes: Output as a range only, separated by a '-', e.g '22-33'

symplectic_field.name: p-requested-embargo-period
symplectic_field.note: 2.1 mapping, to be applied to all binary files on record

symplectic_field.name: place-of-publication
symplectic_field.note: deposit only

symplectic_field.name: publication-date
symplectic_field.note: In the absence of any other information, the year component of this value should also become rights_copyright_date

symplectic_field.name: publication-status
symplectic_field.note: See https://github.com/tomwrobel/ora_data_model/issues/70 also https://github.com/tomwrobel/ora_data_model/issues/112

if.test: there is NO record_publication_date and ANY record_review_status
there is NO record_publication_date OR record_review_status

symplectic_field.name: types
symplectic_field.note: If 'types' is the same as field:type_of_work it should be ignored

if.test: @display-name='Sub type(s)' AND api:item/text != ora_field:type_of_work AND ./text() == 'editorial comment'
@display-name='Sub type(s)' AND api:item/text != ora_field:type_of_work AND ./text() == 'rapid communication'
@display-name='Sub type(s)' AND api:item/text != ora_field:type_of_work AND (./text() != 'editorial comment' OR ./text() != 'rapid communication')
if.note: Value mapping note: the type should be title cased

symplectic_field.name: version
symplectic_field.note: Deposit only, to pass initial paper version to ORA, but not to continuiously update from subsequent papers made available in ORA

if.note: At file level, if multiple files then take value from first file

symplectic_field.name: last-name
symplectic_field.note: Additionally: first names and last name should be added together to create the compound contributors__display_name field in the format "{first-names} {last-name}"

symplectic_field.name: first-names
symplectic_field.note: See note for last-name

symplectic_field.name: full-name
symplectic_field.note: Symplectic full names contain titles, which ORA does not use, instead the first and last names should be combined, as in last-name, above
Additionally: the role_order should follow the order in which an api:person appears in the api:people element
Additionally: the role_order should follow the order in which an api:person appears in the api:people element

symplectic_field.name: primary-group-descriptor
symplectic_field.note: If this field is set, then contributors__institution should be set to "University of Oxford"

else.note: The scheme for the user-identifier-association should become the value of the contributor_identifiers_scheme. However email-address should not be mapped

if.test: Another personal affiliation is set, but no value is set for contributors__institution

symplectic_field.note: As multiple values can be added to this field, this should append to existing values not a replace them
Note that this is set in two places, in the record dmdSec and in amdSec/rightsMD
The value should be prefixed by the string "pubs:", e.g. "pubs:1234"
TODO: a field mapping list will be required

symplectic_field.name: journal

if.test: There is no doi for the related item

symplectic_field.note: Ideally, a citation should be constructed from available citation dates: year of publication, journal title, number, pagination, etc.

symplectic_field.notes:
This is not held in users table,so not crosswalked. ORCID is crosswalked from user.identifiers.
contributors__department
contributors__sub_unit
contributors__contributor_identifiers__contributor_identifiercontributors__contributor_identifier__contributor_identifier_scheme="HESA"Which institutional identifier field is right?
contributors__contributor_identifiers__contributor_identifiercontributors__contributor_identifier__contributor_identifier_scheme="EmployeeNumber"
contributors__contributor_identifiers__contributor_identifiercontributors__contributor_identifier__contributor_identifier_scheme="HESA"Which institutional identifier field is right?

work-type-mappings.symplectic_work_type: scholarly edition Book Book Scholarly edition
edited book Book Book Edited book
journal article editorial comment Journal article JournalArticle Editorial
journal article review Journal article JournalArticle Review
journal article rapid communication Journal article JournalArticle Correspondence
journal article addendum Journal article JournalArticle Addendum
journal article corrigendum Journal article JournalArticle Corrigendum
journal article letter Journal article JournalArticle Letter
report Where SE field 'confidential' has been selected Report Report Confidential report
